attributes.action: bring our troops back from Afghanistan now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we have more to fear from the enemy within, than in afghanistan. the atrocities in london were commited by
people living in bradford etc;
we would feel happier if our troops were
manning borders, and searching lorries
in ports, for our enemy within.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
